name: Colors of the World! Online Trivia | Colors for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: What color might usually be thought of when you think of cardinals and cherries?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	Cardinals are a bright red songbird. Cherries are a sweet red fruit that grow on trees.

questions.text: A clear sky and water are often thought to be which color?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	The sky on a clear summer day is blue. When you look at the ocean it often seems blue.  Oceans are sometimes referred to as "the deep blue sea".

questions.text: What color is raw oil when it first comes out of the ground?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	Oil when it comes from the ground is known as black gold. It is thick, greasy and very black.

Yellow.

	Lemons are bright yellow. Bananas and dragonfruit are yellow too.

Green.

	Most healthy grass is green. This is due to the chlorophyll that is found in most plants.

White.

	Nice, clean snow looks white. Stay clear of colored snow such as yellow snow.

questions.text: What color is tanned skin or dead leaves?
questions.explanation:
Brown.

	Most plant life becomes brown when it dies. Tanned skin is a shade of brown, also.

questions.text: What is the color of ripe plums?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	Purple is a secondary color made from combining red and blue. It is the color of plums which are a sweet fruit used in pies, tarts and jellies.

True.

	A Valencia is a very sweet orange. And just like its name, it is orange when ripe.

questions.text: Indigo is a shade of yellow.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Indigo is a shade between blue and purple. It is a color that comes from a plant, Indigofera tinctorial, that is native to India.
